function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased probability of infectious diseases due to climate change","Impact":"Public health crises and higher vulnerability to climate change","Mitigation":"Adopt resilient solutions to reduce vulnerability and improve emergency response","Technologies":"Climate-resilient infrastructure, early warning systems, digital health solutions","People":"General population, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limitations of systemic approaches in addressing public health in the built environment","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of life cycle assessment, economic and social impact, behavior, and supply chains in pandemic situations","Mitigation":"Integrate life cycle assessment, consider economic and social impact, account for behavioral factors, and develop resilient supply chains","Technologies":"Life cycle assessment tools, supply chain management systems, behavioral analytics","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health experts","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health experts"},{"Description":"Impact of the built environment on disease transmission and public health","Impact":"Complex relationship between built environment, health behaviors, and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adopt a holistic approach to public health, integrate systems, and consider the built environment's impact on health","Technologies":"Integrated health systems, public health data analytics, holistic health impact assessment tools","People":"Healthcare professionals, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governmental health agencies"}]}
